biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Julian Edward Peter Jarrold, born in Norwich, is a BAFTA Award-nominated English film and television director.

He is a member of the family which founded Jarrolds of Norwich in 1823 and was educated in Norfolk at Gresham's School, Holt. He now lives in North London.
